trans-unit.source: Manipulates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that has been applied by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> action.

## Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a ControllableStoryboardAction object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ##暫停、 繼續、 停止或否則控制項分鏡腳本以互動方式可以暫停、 繼續或控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>，以互動方式設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>屬性其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>和使用 ControllableStoryboardAction 物件 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 來控制參考其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>並未指定，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>無法在之後開始時以互動方式控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[How to︰ 使用事件觸發程序來控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> ，開始<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>您想要以互動方式控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> ，開始<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>您想要以互動方式控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
